SELECT DISTINCT(pc.CONTRACT_ID), c.* FROM CONTRACT c LEFT JOIN PROJECT_CONTRACT pc ON c.ID = pc.CONTRACT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND pc.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
AND c.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name},'%')
AND c.CONTACT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{concatName},'%')
AND c.CONTACT_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{concatPhone},'%')
GROUP BY pc.CONTRACT_ID
